subject: Giro d'Italia (Bicycle Race)
Bicycles and Bicycling
lead_paragraph: Giovanni Visconti claimed another solo victory by winning the 17th stage of the Giro d’Italia, a mainly flat 133-mile route from Caravaggio to Vicenza.
snippet: Giovanni Visconti claimed another solo victory by winning the 17th stage of the Giro d’Italia, a mainly flat 133-mile route from Caravaggio to Vicenza.
